snippet.title: Arcade Game: Monaco GP (1979 Sega) [Re-Uploaded}
snippet.description:
A Racing/Driving Game from Sega.

This was one of the last arcade games that ran on a discrete hardware (no roms or cpu). Pro Monaco GP is an update of the original game. 

Emulator : MameUIfx 0.153 
Recorder: Fraps
Encoder: Avisyth+Megui.

Info: Re-Uploaded for not only better video quality but also for the correct original aspect ratio

Note: Re-uploaded for better quality as MAME's internal AVI is not recording this game properly. I had to record with fraps. Hopefully, this the last time I'm re-uploading this.
